definition: Legal Daily, newspaper published by PRC Ministry of Justice
Lawcourt evening news, offshoot of 北京年青报 specialising in legal news, www.fawan.com

sentences.english: Three generations of hereditary patriarchal system is rather profound social basis of Confucian culture.

sentences.english: Tody an increasing number of people have realized that law education is of great importance .In order to keep law and order, very one of us is supposed to get(=receive)a law education.
sentences.chinese: 现在越来越多的人认识到法制教育的重要性。

sentences.english: By the revolutionary impact of white deer before the case was originally a typical legal society.

sentences.english: The plea agreement originated from a criminal jurisdiction system of US.

sentences.english: In the seventh part, the white paper stresses the importance of the "Popularization and Education of the Law."

sentences.english: Cutting back overstaffed organizations and strengthening the legal system are both components of the reform.

sentences.english: The principle of legality was reiterated by the constitution of Claren.

sentences.english: One of the latest such reports was published by the Beijing-based Legal Mirror on Saturday.

sentences.english: To amplify law system can solve the safety problems in production basically.
sentences.chinese: 健全法制是从根本上解决安全生产问题的必由之路。

sentences.english: The legislative procedure is the essential assurance (garante) of democratic legislation and decisive factor.
sentences.chinese: 民主性是法制统一的基础和力量。

sentences.english: The legal foundation in China is not strong enough.
sentences.chinese: 中国的法制基础还不够牢靠。
